trans-unit.source: Contains information required to perform schema importation using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> and <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter"></xref> infrastructure.

The WrappedOptions is used by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerMessageContractImporter> and the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The WrappedOptions class controls whether special-casing is used for document-literal styled documents with wrapped parameters.
Use the **/wrapped** switch with the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](../Topic/ServiceModel%20Metadata%20Utility%20Tool%20\(Svcutil.exe\).md) tool to specify normal casing.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.WrappedOptions"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether special-casing is used for document-wrapped-literal styled documents when parameters are unwrapped.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if special-casing is used for document-wrapped-literal styled documents when parameters are unwrapped; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
